מסתכלים אחורה על השנה במדע ומה הלאה https://www.sciencenews.org/article/looking-back-year-in-science-what-nextNancy Shute Thu, 19 Dec 2024 17:42:53 +0000Uncategorized https://www.sciencenews.org/?p=3147100 Each year we dedicate the final issue of Science News to reviewing the big stories in science, technology and medicine. For the second year in a row, our planet experienced […] 3147100
מקרי המוות הקשורים לקור גדלו מאז 1999 בארה"ב https://www.sciencenews.org/article/cold-temperature-death-rate-hypothermiaAimee Cunningham Thu, 19 Dec 2024 16:35:13 +0000Health & Medicine https://www.sciencenews.org/?p=3147789 From 1999 to 2022, the rate of cold-related deaths rose from about 4 per 1 million people to 9 per 1 million in the United States. 3147789
